name: claude-config-plugins
description: Framework support, language tools, and coding standards as Claude Code plugins. Converted from claude-config templates for always-on guidance.

plugins.name: coding-standards
plugins.description: Universal best practices for all projects - code quality, testing, documentation, security, error handling, API design, and git workflow

plugins.name: python-support
plugins.description: Python language best practices - style guides, dependency management, and common patterns

plugins.name: javascript-support
plugins.description: JavaScript language best practices - style guides and common patterns

plugins.name: typescript-support
plugins.description: TypeScript language best practices - configuration, style guides, and type patterns

plugins.name: fastapi-support
plugins.description: FastAPI REST API framework guidance - includes Python best practices and API patterns

plugins.name: react-js-support
plugins.description: React with JavaScript framework guidance - components, hooks, and best practices

plugins.name: react-ts-support
plugins.description: React with TypeScript framework guidance - type-safe components, hooks, and best practices

plugins.name: python-cli-support
plugins.description: Python CLI application guidance - argument parsing, user interaction, and CLI patterns

plugins.name: mcp-python-support
plugins.description: MCP Server development in Python - protocol implementation and best practices

plugins.name: fullstack-fastapi-react
plugins.description: Full-stack monorepo guidance for FastAPI backend + React JavaScript frontend projects

plugins.name: fullstack-fastapi-react-ts
plugins.description: Full-stack monorepo guidance for FastAPI backend + React TypeScript frontend projects
